DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the Invitrogen SeCore(R) sequencing system and uTYPE(R) interpretation software to the predicate device Invitrogen SSP UniTray(R) with UniMatch(R) interpretation software and show 95% concordance with 90% confidence.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Protocol SeCore, uTYPE and 3500 Dx System
DOC.detailed_description: Testing will be performed on A, B, C, DRB1, DRB3/4/5, DQB1, and DPB1 loci. Additionally, testing will be performed using the following locus specific Group Specific Sequencing Primers: A, B, Cw, DPB1, DQB1 and DRB.
DOC.keyword: Identification and definition of Class I and II Human Leukocyte Antigens (HLA)
